WorkItem.Description:
I tested it with cities in the Netherlands, works perfect. Canvas size is dependent of the zoomlevel, but I had problems with zoom 0 (Black canvas) and zoom 5 ("System.OutOfMemoryException"), so I didn't use them.

I also created a check if there is enough memory for a particularly zoom level, because the program uses huge amounts of it, and made a check if there is StreetView available on the adress in the first place.

Created some public properties, and made a UserControl dll. Also added copyrighttext, cachefolder, and loading bar.

Comments.Message: great!, i'll include it in demo after memory isue will be solved
Max 220MBs ram use right now. Also made a few other minor adjustments.

Hello, I tried in my WPF project the attachment streetview on this page and I will work perfectly. Now I would like more information about the usercontrol, where can I find an online guide? I need to move through streetview. thanks
